cab.content: This Documwtjs V&Prsas&LoL fMilitary Secret.I! /%\v / Invm Viceroy, Army Department, to Sec?-etary of State for India, V .\ ' 1th July 1919., . (Received 7th.)9174. No. 57. Part 1. 1. No change generally.2. Agent at Kabul reports on 27th June three parties in evidence : (a) Amanulla's supporters who ask for peace, (6) Anti-British or War Party, (c) B.A. faction who support B.At Durbar held on 25th June, Mahmnd Tarzi openly advocated continuance of war. Kabul opinion after Durbar was that war would continue.Part 2. Nil.Para. 2 not communicated to Press.
